document.full_text: three children have died and 35 people have become ill from drinking nitrite-tainted milk in gansu province in northwestern china, the xinhua news agency reported.
document.title: asia: china: tainted milk kills 3 children
lines_and_colors: three children have died and 35 people have become ill from drinking nitrite-tainted milk in gansu province in northwestern china, the xinhua news agency reported.
